thread.title: Lois Claybrook
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Lois Claybrook

author: Lois Claybrook
title: Lois Claybrook
text: had to provide covers for delivery guys shoes. refused to take old mattress due to 2 tiny hot chocolate stains on the edge of mattress, size of top of a nail. Very rushed. offered to take it off said they didn't have time. I was going to sweep under bed, but by the time I got back with the broom, the mattress was on the bed. old mattress and box spring taken to garage.
